general.byline: Software Engineer in Austin, TX, he/him
general.about: I'm an computer science major at UT Dallas that loves building for the web.

sideProjects.heading: Planner at Nebula Labs
sideProjects.description: Nebula Planner is a tool for UT Dallas students to create a degree plan and keep track of their graduation requirements.
sideProjects.title: Planner

sideProjects.heading: Hack as a Service
sideProjects.description: Building an open-source Heroku-like PaaS with friends to provide free hosting to students and fellow Hack Club members.
sideProjects.title: Hack as a Service

sideProjects.heading: A Case Study of Leander ISD's Technical Response to COVID-19
sideProjects.description: Over the course of a year, I created a case study focusing on how the usage and adoption of educational technology solutions changed from before school closures due to COVID-19, to the resumption of in-person learning. I examined changes in a Central Texas school district's utilization of educational technology solutions as a result of the COVID-19 pandemic to understand pain points with current technology and infrastructure, and how educational technology can better serve the needs of educators.
sideProjects.title: A Case Study of Leander ISD's Technical Response to COVID-19

workExperience.heading: Web Developer at Agora Labs (acq. Talent Protocol)
workExperience.description: I worked on an early MVP of the platform, a token-gated solution for creators to build online communities using the DeSo protocol.
workExperience.title: Web Developer

education.heading: High School Diploma at Tom Glenn High School
Bachelor of Science at The University of Texas at Dallas
education.school: The University of Texas at Dallas
